sql_CreateDatabase.TemplateString: Create Database If Not Exists `$DBName$` Character Set UTF8;

sql_CreateTable.TemplateString: USE `$DBName$`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{0}`({1});

SQLMap.Remarks: 1.需要为数据库手工导入uuid-ossp.sql（用来生成GUID方法）

sql_RegisterBO.BOSubTemplateString: DELETE FROM "AVA_SYS_UDO1" WHERE "Code" = '{0}' AND "ChildTableName" = '{1}'; INSERT INTO "AVA_SYS_UDO1"("Code","ChildTableName") VALUES(N'{0}',N'{1}');

sql_RegisterBOTable.TemplateString: DELETE FROM "AVA_SYS_OUTB" WHERE "TableName" = '{0}'; INSERT INTO "AVA_SYS_OUTB"("TableName","Descrp","ObjectType") VALUES(N'{0}',N'{1}',N'{2}');
sql_RegisterBOTable.BOFieldTemplateString: DELETE FROM "AVA_SYS_CUFD" WHERE "TableName" = '{0}' AND "FieldName" = '{1}'; INSERT INTO "AVA_SYS_CUFD"("TableName","FieldName","Descrp","DataType","EditType","EditSize","Dflt","IndexID","Sys") VALUES(N'{0}',N'{1}',N'{2}',N'{3}',N'{4}',{5},N'{6}',N'{7}','{8}');

sql_RegisterBO.BOSubTemplateString: DELETE FROM "$DBName$"."AVA_SYS_UDO1" WHERE "Code" = '{0}' AND "ChildTableName" = '{1}'; INSERT INTO "$DBName$"."AVA_SYS_UDO1"("Code","ChildTableName") VALUES(N'{0}',N'{1}');

sql_RegisterBOTable.TemplateString: DELETE FROM "$DBName$"."AVA_SYS_OUTB" WHERE "TableName" = '{0}'; INSERT INTO "$DBName$"."AVA_SYS_OUTB"("TableName","Descrp","ObjectType") VALUES(N'{0}',N'{1}',N'{2}');
sql_RegisterBOTable.BOFieldTemplateString: DELETE FROM "$DBName$"."AVA_SYS_CUFD" WHERE "TableName" = '{0}' AND "FieldName" = '{1}'; INSERT INTO "$DBName$"."AVA_SYS_CUFD"("TableName","FieldName","Descrp","DataType","EditType","EditSize","Dflt","IndexID","Sys") VALUES(N'{0}',N'{1}',N'{2}',N'{3}',N'{4}',{5},N'{6}',N'{7}',N'{8}');

sql_CreateDatabase.TemplateString: Create Database If Not Exists `$DBName$` Character Set UTF8;

sql_CreateTable.TemplateString: USE `$DBName$`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{0}`({1});

sql_RegisterBO.TemplateString: USE `$DBName$`; INSERT INTO `AVA_SYS_ONNM`(`ObjectCode`,`AutoKey`,`DocSubType`) VALUES(N'{0}',1,'--') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `AutoKey` = `AutoKey`;

sql_RegisterBOTable.BOFieldTemplateString: DELETE FROM "AVA_SYS_BOI1" WHERE "Name" = N'{9}' AND "Property" = N'{10}' INSERT INTO "AVA_SYS_BOI1"("Name","Property","Mapped","Descrp","DataType","EditType","EditSize","Searched","Systemed") VALUES(N'{9}',N'{10}',N'{1}',N'{2}',N'{3}',N'{4}',{5},N'{7}',N'{8}')

DELETE FROM "$DBName$"."AVA_SYS_BOI1" WHERE "Name" = N'{9}' AND "Property" = N'{10}' INSERT INTO "$DBName$"."AVA_SYS_BOI1"("Name","Property","Mapped","Descrp","DataType","EditType","EditSize","Searched","Systemed") VALUES(N'{9}',N'{10}',N'{1}',N'{2}',N'{3}',N'{4}',{5},N'{7}',N'{8}')

sql_CreateDatabase.TemplateString: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM sys.databases where name = '$DBName$') CREATE DATABASE "$DBName$"

sql_CreateTable.TemplateString: USE "$DBName$" IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM sys.sysobjects WHERE name = '{0}' AND type = 'u') CREATE TABLE "{0}"({1})
sql_CreateTable.AlterFieldTemplateString: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM sys.syscolumns WHERE object_name(id) = '{0}' AND name = '{1}') ALTER TABLE "{0}" ADD {2}
sql_CreateTable.AlterPrimaryKeyTemplateString: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM sys.sysobjects WHERE xtype = 'PK' AND object_name(id) = 'K{0}') ALTER TABLE "{0}" ADD CONSTRAINT K{0} PRIMARY KEY ({1})

sql_CreateTableUniqueIndex.TemplateString: USE "$DBName$" IF EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.indexes WHERE object_name(object_id)='{0}' AND name = '{0}_UNIQUE_INDEX') DROP INDEX {0}.{0}_UNIQUE_INDEX CREATE UNIQUE INDEX {0}_UNIQUE_INDEX ON {0}({1})

sql_RegisterBO.TemplateString: USE "$DBName$" IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM "AVA_SYS_ONNM" WHERE ObjectCode = N'{0}') INSERT INTO "AVA_SYS_ONNM"(ObjectCode,AutoKey,DocSubType) VALUES(N'{0}',1,'--')

sql_RegisterBOTable.TemplateString: USE "$DBName$" DELETE FROM "AVA_SYS_OBOI" WHERE Name =N'{3}' INSERT INTO "AVA_SYS_OBOI"(Mapped,Descrp,ObjectType,Name,Code) VALUES(N'{0}',N'{1}',N'{2}',N'{3}',N'{4}')
sql_RegisterBOTable.BOFieldTemplateString: DELETE FROM "AVA_SYS_BOI1" WHERE Name = N'{9}' AND Property = N'{10}' INSERT INTO "AVA_SYS_BOI1"(Name,Property,Mapped,Descrp,DataType,EditType,EditSize,Searched,Systemed) VALUES(N'{9}',N'{10}',N'{1}',N'{2}',N'{3}',N'{4}',{5},N'{7}',N'{8}')
